overall_summary: Development has shifted towards core performance optimizations, including a major refactor of the message service and infrastructure migration to the Jeju network. Concurrently, the community is managing a complex token migration while expanding the framework through experimental projects like roseOS.
key_facts: Odilitime is updating plugin-github and creating a new plugin-git repository.
PR #6286 implemented streaming functionality with confirmed testing success.
The license year for the elizaos/eliza repository was updated to 2026 in PR #6301.
Initial free credits for new users were reduced from $5 to $1.
PR #6316 was submitted to fix parameterization issues in the plugin-sql component using sql.raw().
Stan introduced a logging linter in the eliza/config package to validate format compliance.
DDR5 memory prices increased from $400 to $1200 between September 2025 and January 2026.
The elizaos/eliza repository received 16 new issues between January 2 and January 4, 2026.
open_questions: What will happen to Ai16z tokens bought after the snapshot and can they be migrated?
When is the specific migration deadline for the tokens?
Is it possible to import an entire codebase as an agent to Eliza through GitHub?
Can 'knowledge & lore' sections be added to the JSON character format manually as in previous versions?
Is there a way to get the agent to tweet polls automatically?

twitter_news_highlights.claim: ElizaOS ranked among the top 5 Solana runners over a 24-hour period.
Hyperscape agents are training combat autonomously with zero human input via ElizaOS.

new_issues_prs.title: fix(plugin-sql): use sql.raw() for SET LOCAL to avoid parameterization
new_issues_prs.author: 0xbbjoker
new_issues_prs.significance: Critical fix for PostgreSQL syntax errors when data isolation is enabled.

new_issues_prs.title: refactor(default-message-service): optimize provider handling in MultiStep
new_issues_prs.author: standujar
new_issues_prs.significance: Significant performance refactor resulting in faster execution for multi-step agent actions.

new_issues_prs.title: Connect wallet action should lead directly to wallet options
new_issues_prs.author: borisudovicic
new_issues_prs.significance: UI/UX streamlining of the onboarding process.

overall_focus.claim: The project is currently focused on internal execution optimizations, cleaning up a backlog of UI issues, and securing the foundation for a v2.0.0 release.

discord_updates.summary: Focus on clearing the PR review queue and addressing a technical gap where singleShot functionality lacks parameter support.
Discussion on multi-model implementation using OpenRouter and deployment strategies for custom plugins in cloud containers.
Strategic exploration of 'Eliza DWS Transform,' an AI-powered agent to automate migration and cost reduction from AWS to the Jeju network.

user_feedback.feedback_summary: Users reported zero balances and compatibility issues when trying to migrate tokens using Tangem wallets.
Request for better audio-to-text conversion that captures emotional context, pace, and tempo rather than just literal transcription.

strategic_insights.insight: There is a significant opportunity to disrupt the SMB hosting market by using agents to autonomously manage technology stacks and server administration.
implications_or_questions: How will traditional hosting companies react to decentralized infrastructure networks?

strategic_insights.insight: The introduction of roseOS suggests a shift toward modular, accountability-layered agent frameworks that prioritize traceability over black-box autonomy.
implications_or_questions: Should ElizaOS adopt explicit agency boundaries as a core standard?

market_analysis.observation: DDR5 memory prices tripled from $400 to $1200, affecting procurement for infrastructure expansion.
market_analysis.relevance: Directly impacts the cost-effectiveness and scalability of the decentralized hosting vision.
